query.postgres: SELECT public_host_address FROM qr_code_data WHERE id=1
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS qr_code_data( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, public_host_address VARCHAR(100), local_host_address VARCHAR(100), storage_path VARCHAR(100), active BOOLEAN)
SELECT local_host_address FROM qr_code_data WHERE id=1
ALTER TABLE sungero_content_edocversion ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS public_password VARCHAR(100)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS eimzo_data( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, signer_name VARCHAR(100), edoc_id INT, thumbprint VARCHAR(100), sign_date VARCHAR(100))
